title: Sweet potato and sweetcorn chowder
ingredients: ['4 sweet potatoes', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 carrots, peeled and diced', '2 stick celery, chopped', '1/2 large Spanish onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1.2L vegetable stock', '300ml single cream', '1 (418g) tin creamed style corn', '3 tablespoons soft brown sugar, or to taste', '1/2 tablespoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes', '1/2 teaspoon soy sauce', '1/2 teaspoon red wine vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '275g sweetcorn, drained', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
